presets.name: ice sheet
descriptions: look:The ice sheet below you is as clear as glass.

presets.name: plexiglass window
descriptions: look:Beyond the plexiglass window, you stare into the space. The vastness makes you feel lonely.

presets.name: steel wall
descriptions: look:You see the industrial steel wall of the space station.

presets.name: ice wall
descriptions: look:You see your reflection in the wall of ice.

presets.name: Thicc Ice
descriptions: short:You are standing on thicc ice. Low chance of death.

presets.name: Thin Ice
descriptions: short:You are standing on thin ice. High chance of death.

presets.name: Ice Death
descriptions: short:You fell into the ice. You died.

presets.name: Rocket ladder
descriptions: short:You are on a ladder. You cannot see anything.

presets.name: corridor
descriptions: short:You are in an empty corridor.
short:Everything is black. Everything. You hear noises - is that a creepy AI? Or is it Nicolas Tong?

presets.name: Ladder
descriptions: short:Congratulations. You beat the level. Now get ready for death!

presets.name: airlock
descriptions: short:The room around you looks to be an airlock, with a steel hatch in front of you.

presets.name: hatch
descriptions: short:It is a steel hatch that looks like it can be opened.

presets.name: rock wall
descriptions: short:You see a solid wall of rock.

presets.name: Rock Death
presets.descriptions: short:You were impaled by a falling stagalamite and then brutally crushed by rocks. :)

presets.name: rock room
descriptions: short:You are in a dimly lit room, surrounded by rock and stone.
